channel.title: MASE To Dos
channel.description: Recent content on MASE To Dos

item.title: Friday, December 6th, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Make sure your T-Chart is up to date with all code and vocab through Lesson 9 Make sure your Code.org work through Lesson 9 is complete Play around with Code.org Dance Party Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Friday, December 6, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Complete Hour 3 in your Survival Guide Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Friday, December 6, 2019
item.description: Do Now: Log into Google Classroom and Code.org Add the new vocab to your T-Chart Watch the vide on Bubble 2 in Lesson 9 of Code.org Complete Bubble 3 Complete Bubble 4 Complete Bubble 5 Complete Bubble 7 If you finish those, work on the rest of the bubbles Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Thursday, December 5, 2019
item.description: Do Now: Log into Google Classroom and Code.org Add the new vocab to your T-Chart Watch the vide on Bubble 2 in Lesson 9 of Code.org Complete Bubble 3 Complete Bubble 4 Complete Bubble 5 Complete Bubble 7 If you finish those, work on the rest of the bubbles Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Thursday, December 5, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Take a look at the birthday tool (linked in Google Classroom) Get out your T-Chart Put new vocab and code in your T-Chart Watch the intro video independently at your seat Work through the bubbles in Lesson 9 Exit Ticket: Make sure you have all of today’s new vocab and code in your T-Chart. Log out of Google Classroom and Code.org.

item.title: Thursday, December 5, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Refer to your Survival Guide for Day 1 tasks Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Wednesday, December 4, 2019
item.description: Do Now: Log into Google Classroom and Code.org Add the new vocab to your T-Chart Watch the video on the big screen Complete bubble 3 as a class Complete bubbles 5, 6, 7, 9 Exit Ticket: Make sure you have all of today’s new vocab and code in your T-Chart. Log out of Google Classroom and Code.org.

item.title: Wednesday, December 4, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Refer to your Survival Guide for Day 1 tasks Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Wednesday, December 4, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Get out your T-Chart Add the new vocab and code to your T-Chart Watch the intro video Do bubble 3 as a class Finish the rest of the lesson independently Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Monday, December 2, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Play Kahoot! Watch the video on the big screen Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Monday, December 2, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Play Kahoot! Watch the video on the big screen Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Monday, December 2, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Read the submission requirements for the AP Explore Performance Task Discuss: What do you need to submit? Examine the provided samples Discuss: What’s the #1 piece of advice you have for someone taking on this task? What’s a “gotcha” people should look out for? What’s one question you still have about the task? Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Thursday, November 21, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Review the new vocab Review the Activity Guide and One-Pager Watch the video about cybercrime Choose your topic to research Begin researching Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Thursday, November 21, 2019
item.description: Do Now: Go to Google Classroom and follow the link to Khan Academy in today’s assignment Complete the drawing with code activity linked in Google Classroom Exit Ticket: If you did one of the projects at the end of the lesson, paste the link to your work in Google Classroom.

item.title: Thursday, November 21, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Complete the drawing with code activity linked in Google Classroom Paste the link to one of the projects at the end of the lesson into the assignment in Google Classroom and submit it Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Wednesday, November 20, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Go over new vocab as a class Do the first cipher as a class Complete the rest of the bubbles individually or with a partner Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Wednesday, November 20, 2019
item.description: Lesson 6 Day 2 Do Now: Write the 3 steps for drawing a sprite in your T-chart Go to Lesson 6 in Code.org Work on the rest of the levels in Lesson 6 Exit Ticket: In your T-Chart, write the definition of “dot notation.”

item.title: Wednesday, November 20, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Add the 3 steps to drawing a sprite to your T-Chart (in Lesson 6 in Google Classroom) Finish up Lesson 6 in Code.org Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Tuesday, November 19, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Choose one of the apps you discussed in yesterday’s Do Now to complete your Activity Guide about Research that app’s privacy policy Complete your Activity Guide Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Tuesday, November 19, 2019
item.description: Unit 3, Lesson 6: Sprites Complete and turn in your Do Now Add new vocab to your T-chart Watch Sprites video as a class Complete bubbles 4 and 5 as a class Independently work through the rest of the lesson in Code.org Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Monday, November 18, 2019
item.description: Do Now: Go through the vocab that’s posted in Google Classroom and write it in your T-Chart Go to Lesson 4 in Code.org Complete Level 2 Complete Level 3 Complete Level 4 Complete Level 5 Complete Level 9 Exit Ticket: Add the new code to your T-Chart

item.title: Monday, November 18, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Watch The Future Of Big Data (Also linked in Code.org) Read the article attached to the Google Classroom assignment: “It’s Modern Trade: Web Users Get as Much as They Give” Participate in class discussion Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Monday, November 18, 2019
item.description: Today’s emoji was chosen by Nick Maden Complete and turn in your Do Now Add new vocab to your T-Chart Work through Lesson 5 in Code.org Make sure you’ve added all the new code to your T-Chart Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Friday, November 15, 2019
item.description: Do Now: Go through the vocab that’s posted in Google Classroom and write it in your T-Chart Go to Lesson 4 in Code.org Complete Level 2 Complete Level 3 Complete Level 4 Complete Level 5 Complete Level 9 Exit Ticket: Add the new code to your T-Chart

item.title: Friday, November 15, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Make sure you’ve completed all your work in lessons 1-4 in Code.org Make sure your T-chart is up to date with all vocab and code from lessons 1-4 in Code.org Check off your T-chart with Ms. Coxwell for a grade Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Friday, November 15, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Check out the visualization of the world’s biggest data breaches Fill out your Activity Guide Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Thursday, November 11, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Complete your research about your chosen innovation Find a visual artifact that describes your innovation Make sure you have references included in your Project Guide Turn in your Project Guide and One-Pager Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Thursday, November 14, 2019
item.description: Do Now: Write the new vocab on your T-Chart Watch the video in Level 2 on the big screen Watch Ms. Coxwell do Levels 3 and 4 on the big screen Complete Level 3 in Code.org Complete Level 4 in Code.org Complete Level 5 in Code.org Exit Ticket: Explain to Ms. Brittney what a variable is

item.title: Thursday, November 14, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Add new vocab to your T-Chart Work through Lesson 5 in Code.org Make sure you’ve added all the new code to your T-Chart Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Wednesday, November 13, 2019
item.description: Do Now: Go through the vocab that’s posted in Google Classroom and write it in your T-Chart Go to Lesson 4 in Code.org Complete Level 2 Complete Level 3 Complete Level 4 Complete Level 5 Complete Level 9 Exit Ticket: Add the new code to your T-Chart

item.title: Wednesday, November 13, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Add new vocab and code to your T-Chart Work through the levels in Lesson 4 of Code.org Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Wednesday, November 12, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Look over the activity guide and one-pager as a class Select an innovation; don’t spend a ton of time on this step. Start finding resources about your innovation Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Thursday, November 7, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Look through new vocab and code Watch Ms. Coxwell complete levels 1-5 in Lesson 3 Complete level 6 Complete level 8 Complete level 9 Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Thursday, November 7, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Use the Google Trends website to investigate an idea that is interesting to you Do the Activity Guide to tell a story with the data you find Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Wednesday, November 6, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Use the Google Trends website to investigate an idea that is interesting to you Do the Activity Guide to tell a story with the data you find Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Thursday, November 7, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Add your new vocab to your T-chart Complete levels 1-5 of Lesson 3 as a class Work through the rest of the bubbles independently Make sure you’ve met all the requirements on Level 9! If there is time, work on the Lesson 3 Extras Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Tuesday, November 5, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Check out the drawing tool on Level 2 of Lesson 2 in Code.org Follow along during the drawing activity Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Tuesday, November 5, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Review Moore’s Law Complete the Big Data Sleuth Card Review pages 4-6 of the AP Test PDF Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Monday, November 4, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Think: What is your favorite form of entertainment? Complete the Activity Guide Turn in your Activity Guide Take a look at the animations and games in levels 3-6 on Code.org Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Monday, November 4, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in Do Now Watch TED Talk video Start on Activity Guide Complete and turn in Exit Ticket
